mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SPECIAL FEATURES "Frills and Starch", "Class Time is Coming", "Square Dance Officers' Guide", "The Answer Man", "A Special Club Project", "New Dancers: After Class - What?", "Ten Commandments for Square Dancers", "Party Night", "Beginners Are Frosting on the Cake", "Vox Saltator", and "Experimental Lab". REGULAR FEATURES "Square Dance Picture", "Square Dance Date Book", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Chuck Jones' Note Book", "Round the Outside Ring", "Americana: John Henry", "Style Series: Shuffle the Deck", "Caller of the Month: Bud Grass", "Paging the Roundancers: Ivan and Aileen Pierson" and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
